Description: * Initial wall jump no longer costs stamina
* Stamina now regenerates faster (from 5s to 4.5s for 1 stamina)
* Removed on bullet hit move slow
* Time delay before sprint starts working after hero/neutral interaction reduced from 4s to 3s

* Weakened {{PageRef|Patron}} now gains 50% damage reduction if one defender is in the {{PageRef|Pit|alt_name=pit}} and 100% if two or more are (defenders must be in {{PageRef|Pit|alt_name=pit}} for at least 2s for reduction to kick in)
